attributes.action: We, the people, have lost all faith in the UK Government. CALL A SNAP ELECTION.
attributes.additional_details: Not only are the UK Government supporting overseas tax havens, but they have also abused the Investigatory Powers Act, spying on organisations such as Amnesty International without reason. How are the people supposed to back a Government that lies constantly and continuously u-turns on the policies that got them elected. There have also been secret meetings between the international development secretary and the Israeli Army, hoping to send them taxpayer money. LISTEN TO THE ELECTORATE.
attributes.background: With the leak of the paradise papers, it has been made clear that the UK Government are not listening to the will of the people. They continue to support large corporations while the poorest suffer.
